title: Roast turkey breast crown with garlic sauce
ingredients: ['1 turkey breast joint on the bone, about 2.25kg (5lb)', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '15 garlic cloves, unpeeled, lightly crushed to break the skins', '350ml (12fl oz) chicken stock', '2 teaspoons lemon juice']
